thread.section_title: Birkenhead House - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Hermanus, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Old School Charm / Beach Escape
thread.title_full: Old School Charm / Beach Escape - Review of Birkenhead House, Hermanus, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Mary D
title: Old School Charm / Beach Escape
text: While less modern than other places we stayed on our honeymoon, Birkenhead House charmed us with its stunning location, views, top notch service, and excellent cuisine (menu changes daily). We enjoy having our meals "al fresco" in the outdoor dining spaces. At times, it seemed "crowded" in the pool area even though there were only ~10 or so people out there at a time. We played golf and hiked in the nature reserve nearby. The best part of this all-inclusive experience was that we didn't have to plan anything and could really relax and take it in. Three nights was perfect.
